articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Dae Jung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Dae Jung
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, to the bier of ex-President Kim Dae Jung was courteously placed on Friday by the special envoy group led by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on a visit to Seoul.
					The group courteously conveyed the message of condolences and words of profound consolation sent by Kim Jong Il to the bereaved family of the deceased.
					
					Present there were officials concerned of the funeral committee for ex-President Kim Dae Jung from the south side.
					
					The group arrived in Seoul on Friday by special plane.

articles.title: Special Envoy Group Leaves for Seoul
articles.content:
Special Envoy Group Leaves for Seoul
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Upon authorization of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a special envoy group led by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, left here Friday by special plane to mourn the death of ex-President Kim Dae Jung.

articles.title: Chinese Vice-Foreign Minister and His Party Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Vice-Foreign Minister and His Party Visit DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China, and his party visited the DPRK from Aug. 17 to 21.
					While staying in the DPRK, they visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					They paid a courtesy call on Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, and held talks with Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.
					
					At the talks and conversations they had an in-depth discussion on the issue of boosting the DPRK-China friendly relations, regional situation and other matters of common concern. 
					
					The guests enjoyed the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed by Young People
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed by Young People
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place by youth and students at the Central Youth Hall on Friday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 A report of Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, was followed by speeches there. 
					
					 They said that the history of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership marked sacred years during which he has resolutely defended President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and military affairs and developed them in depth as well as a course shining with victories and glories in which he provided invincible military might by pursuing the original Songun politics and brought about epoch-making miracles and changes in confrontation with imperialists and the United States and building a rich and powerful country. 
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il has developed the People's Army into an invincible and strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu with his Songun revolutionary leadership and demonstrated to the world the dignity and might of Juche Korea in defending socialism and building a great prosperous and powerful nation by firmly consolidating the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks.
					
					They stressed the need for the youth to firmly arm themselves with the Songun revolutionary idea of Kim Jong Il and become first-line death-defying corps and human bombs and bullets defending the headquarters of the revolution politically and ideologically and at the risk of their lives, carrying forward the sacred tradition of devotedly safeguarding the leader.
					
					 Poem "Long Live Great Victory of Songun!" was recited at the meeting.

articles.title: Art Performance Given
articles.content:
Art Performance Given
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Friday on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including narration and chorus "Glory to General" and male solo "Tell, O Road of Songun".
					
					 The performers, representing the unanimous reverence of the youth and students and all other people of the country, extended the highest glory to Kim Jong Il leading the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation to victory with his great Songun revolutionary leadership and enthusiastically sang of their immense honor and happiness of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 In their light music for accordion solo "Let's Become Soldiers of the Army of the General", agitation drama and male chorus "We Will Hold Arms More Tightly" and other numbers the performers powerfully demonstrated the firm faith and will of the young people to defend the socialist motherland in the same spirit as displayed by the young heroes of the preceding generations and speed up the general advance of the Songun revolution, true to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Korean People Will Deal Merciless Annihilating Strike to Aggressors
articles.content:
Korean People Will Deal Merciless Annihilating Strike to Aggressors
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors have been frantically staging the large-scale Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression across south Korea from August 17.
					The Korean people are full of surging indignation against the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and are ready to mercilessly punish the aggressors.
					
					Kim Yong In, vice-minister of the Ministry of Education, told KCNA that the U.S. imperialists and Lee Myung Bak group of traitors revealed once again their foul aggressive nature to stifle the DPRK by force at any cost through the current joint military exercises. He went on:
					
					The enemies are holding the large-scale joint military rehearsal, following the aggressive Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in March. This stark reality patently discloses that they are war fanatics.
					
					In particular the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, which does not exercise the command of the armed forces at their will, to say nothing of the political sovereignty, is more desperately clinging to the fratricidal confrontation in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. This is a traitorous action that should be denounced down through generations.
					
					The Korean People's Army and people are fully ready to react with merciless retaliation of our own style and with all-out war of justice if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers invade our inviolable territory even an inch. The aggressors should clearly know that they will never talk an empty word.
					
					Ri Jong Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, stated that it is the invariable stand and attitude of the KPA to react to the war fanatics' arms with artillery pieces, "sanctions" with merciless retaliation and "confrontation" with an all-out confrontation. He continued:
					
					We have built powerful self-reliant armed forces under the banner of Songun and are fully prepared to cope with any mode of war of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.
					
					Should the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets commit even the slightest military provocation to infringe upon the DPRK's sovereignty, its revolutionary armed forces which have been strengthened as invincible ones with the might of Songun will deliver a merciless and prompt annihilating strike to the aggressors by mobilizing all military means.
					
					 Kang Song Guk, a student of Kim Il Sung University, emphasized that the students will hold the rifle instead of the pen and shower bullets of retaliation on the aggressors if the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors force a war upon us.

articles.title: Sokbinggo, Old Ice Storehouse of Korea
articles.content:
Sokbinggo, Old Ice Storehouse of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Freezing and refrigerating facilities are indispensable for the human life especially in the hottest period of summer.
					The Korean nation had long made an effective use of Sokbinggo, which could be called the ancestor of modern refrigerating facilities.
					
					Such ice storehouses were built with stones near clear water resources to preserve natural ice.
					
					Typical of them is the ice storehouse in Okgye-dong, Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					It is a vaulted semi-underground structure constructed around the 10th century.
					
					The inside of the house is 28.3 meters long, 4.5 meters wide and about 6 meters high. The 1.5-meter-thick soil mixed with lime was hardened above the vaulted ceiling and covered with turf so as to shut off the solar heat and hot air.
					
					The ice storehouses were all built in arch style, dovetailed with a thousand and hundreds of well trimmed granite stones without adhesives. This shows part of the fine architecture of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Cool and Fragrant Sweets
articles.content:
Cool and Fragrant Sweets
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The demand for Eskimo Pie and ice-lolly is increasing among the people these days when the summer heat persists. 
					The Eskimo Pie and ice-lolly, which are made with milk products, sugar, fruit juice, spices and others, are cool, sweet and fragrant and good for health.
					
					The Eskimo Pie Factory under the Pyongyang City Public Catering Management Bureau has made efforts to increase assortments of products. It produces more than 10 kinds of Eskimo Pies including apricot stone, apple and chocolate Eskimo Pies and succeeded in using glucose good for health instead of sugar.
					
					It also invented and introduced a new cooling device and thus increased the production by 40 percent higher than before.
					
					The Eskimo Pie and ice-lolly of the factory are popular for their good taste, fragrance and high nutritive value.
					
					They are sold in more than 700 places of the city every day.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves for Increasing Defense Spending
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves for Increasing Defense Spending
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Recently Japan has become evermore undisguised in its moves to increase its defense spending.
					The government and the ruling Liberal Democratic Party of Japan specified the necessity to increase the defense spending in a "basic policy" and a "final proposal" to be submitted when the "defence programme guidelines" will be amended at the end of this year.
					
					The above-said development is a vivid expression of the militaristic scenario of Japan to aggravate the regional situation by beefing up and updating its armed forces.
					
					Japan has systematically increased the military spending under the signboard of "defense" for many years. 
					
					Japan's defense spending in the state budget has already exceeded 40 billions U.S. dollars; the bulk of it has been channeled into the modernization of the "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)".
					
					Projects are in full gear to introduce large-sized ships and long-distance planes, realize nuclear weaponization and militarize space.
					
					Are all these moves for the "defense of Japan's territory"?
					
					Japan is apt to cite "regional security" as a pretext for boosting its defense spending.
					
					This is exemplified by Japan's claims that the "situation in Northeast Asia does not allow it to cut down defense spending" and "it should have armed forces in place to cope with contingency in the surrounding areas."
					
					Its assertions are nothing but sophism to justify its snowballing defense spending and arms build-up and deceive the international community.
					
					The above-said moves of Japan are aimed at having an unchallenged military edge in Northeast Asia and launching continental aggression.
					
					Today the international community is expressing serious concern about the fact that the government, the ruling party and the military in Japan are becoming unanimously assertive for increasing defense spending.
					
					It is as clear as pikestaff that Japan's moves for increasing the defense spending will bring horrible disasters to Northeast Asia and the rest of the world sooner or later.

articles.title: Intensified Ideological Work Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Ideological Work Called for
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary idea of the popular masses is the most powerful weapon for foiling the imperialists' anti-socialist moves. 
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The revolutionary idea plays a decisive role in prompting the popular masses to frustrate the imperialists' anti-socialist moves and defend socialism to the last.
					
					It is nonsensical for anyone to claim he stands for protecting socialism without knowing what vicious forces the imperialists are and what their anti-socialist moves are. 
					
					Only when one has revolutionary idea, can one clearly see through the black-hearted ambition of the imperialists to eliminate socialism, the ideal and future of humankind, from the surface of the earth once and for all, their aggressive nature and anti-socialist moves. 
					
					The revolutionary idea serves as an engine motivating the popular masses to turn out as one in the vigorous struggle to frustrate the anti-socialist moves of the imperialists. 
					
					Socialism in some countries collapsed too easily, overpowered by the imperialists' despicable anti-socialist offensives. This happened because those countries neglected the ideological work to arm the popular masses with the revolutionary idea and allowed bourgeois idea to find its ways to them. 
					
					The army and people given revolutionary education and equipped with firm faith through the ideological work are capable of clearly seeing through the imperialists' whole gamut of anti-socialist moves and mercilessly foiling them.
					
					No matter how desperately the imperialist forces may work to launch a nuclear war, such type of army and people are not afraid of it even in the least but fight against them to a bitter end with staunch spirit and pluck. This is the experience and truth learned by the army and people in the DPRK in their revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-"government" Struggle Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-"government" Struggle Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Aug. 15, calling for the anti-U.S., anti-war and anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle.
					The statement recalled that after setting foot in south Korea under the guise of "liberator", the U.S. rigged up the Syngman Rhee "government" and inflicted untold sufferings on the south Korean people. 
					
					Several decades have passed since then, but the U.S. forces are still occupying this land and there is nothing changed except replacement only in name of dictatorial "government," it pointed out.
					
					The statement charged that the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group are working hard to quell the Korean nation's desire for independence, democracy and reunification and free themselves from the crisis of destruction.
					
					If the U.S. imperialists and the Lee group, their lackey, are allowed to exist, the independent reunification, the desire of the Korean nation, and the building of democratic society can never be realized, the statement said, contending that all the patriotic people should closely unite and punish the foreign forces and dictators.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves to Revive Dictatorship Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Organizations including the Association of Reservists for Peace of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 18 to assail the puppet group of traitors for working hard to revive dictatorship.
					 The organizations in a press release referred to the recent disclosure of the fact that the "Defense Security Command" illegally kept watch on civilians, adding they cannot repress astonishment and resentment at the fact.
					
					 Recalling that after Lee Myung Bak came to power he set up a system whereby he gets a report directly from the chief of the "Defense Security Command", thereby reviving the fascist dictatorship, the press release lashed out at the DSC for further intensifying its interference in political affairs as the days go by. 
					
					 The authorities seek through this to create a repressive atmosphere as intended by them and build a dictatorial system by setting in motion such ruling machines as the DSC, the press release noted.
					
					 It urged the Lee Myung Bak group to stop the moves to revive dictatorship at once and punish those involved in the operation to watch civilians.

articles.title: Songun Politics of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Songun Politics of Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A lecture was held in Mexico and a seminar in Peru on August 12 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 In the lecture, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, praised Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, as the peerlessly illustrious commander of Songun and prominent leader of the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il's Songun politics firmly guarantees the DPRK's socialist cause with armed forces.
					
					 In the seminar, the secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and other personages lauded the validity and vitality of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Peru.

articles.title: Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Il Highly Praised
articles.content:
Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Il Highly Praised
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued its bulletin on Aug. 11 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The bulletin said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il and Songun Revolutionary Leadership" that the Korean revolution was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's start of Songun leadership on August 25, 1960, provided a decisive guarantee for carrying forward the history and tradition of the Songun revolutionary cause in the DPRK down through generations, it stressed.
					
					The Korean People's Army has grown to be an invincible army under the Songun leadership of
						Kim Jong Il, it said, and went on:
					
					Socialist Korea could advance only along the road of victory thanks to his Songun leadership.
					
					The Korean army and people have reliably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism, resolutely containing with the might of Songun the anti-DPRK offensive of the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world. They are now making a new great revolutionary surge to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Peaceful Reunification of Korea Urged
articles.content:
Peaceful Reunification of Korea Urged
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Rohekele Andre, president of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, and the chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the association made public a joint statement on Aug. 14 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					The statement said that the working people in Democratic Congo urge the United Nations, the U.S. and Japan to strive to provide favorable circumstances for durable peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula and, in particular, withdraw the foreign troops from south Korea and the south Korean authorities to stop the anti-DPRK moves.
					
					It also strongly demanded that the present U.S. administration drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					Hoping that the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula would be realized at an early date, the statement reaffirmed the stand to strengthen the solidarity with the peace-loving people of the world and extend sustained support to the just struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held events to commemorate the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Present there were officials of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration including its Chairperson Jo Yun Hae, compatriots and the DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and staff members of his embassy.
					
					On August 15 the participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid high tribute to them.
					
					There was a commemorative meeting on August 14.
					
					The speaker at the meeting said that August 15 is the day when the President accomplished the historic cause of national liberation by leading the great anti-Japanese war to brilliant victory.
					
					The successes being achieved in strengthening the military capability and building a great prosperous and powerful nation in the homeland would have been unthinkable without the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					He stressed that all Koreans overseas should make positive contribution to the building of a thriving nation in the homeland, true to the Songun idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The meeting was followed by a performance of compatriot artistes.
					
					There were also a photo exhibition on the theme of "Kindling the Flames of Great Surge" and a film show.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- John Paul Cupp, chairman of the U.S. Solidarity Committee to Support the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and the South Korean People's Struggle and chief of the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics, released a statement on Aug. 12 in protest against the large-scale joint military exercises for aggression by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique.
					The statement branded the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises staged by the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group as aggression moves for threatening the independent political system of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. imperialists, main obstacle to Korea's reunification, should no longer interfere in the Korean affairs, it urged.
					
					The DPRK has firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country in any circumstances under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the statement noted, adding that all the Korean people in the north and the south and the world progressives are supporting the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as the most correct guiding idea for the anti-imperialist class struggle in the present era.

articles.title: Elimination of Traitors Urged
articles.content:
Elimination of Traitors Urged
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the United States issued a statement on August 15, calling for elimination of the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese flunkeyist and traitorous forces.
					The statement noted that though 64 years have passed since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists, descendants of the pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese elements are still swaggering about in south Korea, seeking the permanent division of the nation.
					
					It is impossible to expect the prosperity and future of the Korean Peninsula and the prospect for independence and peaceful reunification of the country is gloomy as long as the above-said traitors remain in power in south Korea, it said.
					
					It referred to the fact that the U.S. is now getting frantic with the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises while making the Lee Myung Bak's group of traitors play the role of shock brigade for the realization of its strategy of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					The Lee group is scheming to maintain its power at the sacrifice of the people and turn south Korea into a society of pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackeys, the statement charged.
					
					It contended that the anti-war peace movement should be vigorously waged and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration be implemented to the letter, in particular, in order to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Kim Dae Jung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Kim Dae Jung
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ATCC) -- La ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue depositada cortesmente el dia 21 al pie del feretro del ex presidente surcoreano Kim Dae Jung por el grupo de enviados especiales encabezado por el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, de visita en Seul.
					Este grupo transmitio tambien con cortesia a los familiares del difunto el mensaje de condolencias y las palabras de consuelo profundo del Dirigente. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte surcoreana los interesados de la comision funeral del ex presidente Kim Dae Jung.
					
					El grupo de enviados especiales llego el dia 21 a Seul por avion especial.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang el grupo de enviados especiales
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang el grupo de enviados especiales
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ATCC) -- Por encargo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el grupo de enviados especiales encabezado por el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, partio el dia 21 de esta capital por avion especial para expresar condolencias por el fallecimiento del ex presidente surcoreano Kim Dae Jung.

articles.title: Vicecanciller chino y su comitiva visitan Corea
articles.content:
Vicecanciller chino y su comitiva visitan Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ATCC) -- El viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de China, Wu Dawei, y su comitiva visitaron del dia 17 al 21 la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Durante su estancia, los huespedes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					
					Tambien, realizaron visitas de cortesia al vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, y al canciller, Pak Ui Chun, y sostuvieron conversaciones con el vicecanciller Kim Kye Gwan.
					
					En las ocasiones hubo debates profundos de los problemas de interes mutuo como las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y la situacion regional.
					
					Los huespedes chinos presenciaron la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang".

articles.title: Juventud coreana celebra dia conmemorativo del Songun
articles.content:
Juventud coreana celebra dia conmemorativo del Songun
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 49o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), tuvo lugar el dia 21 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto de festejo de los jovenes y estudiantes.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin, los funcionarios correspondientes, los de la Union de la Juventud Socialista
						 Kim Il Sung (UJS), los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos.
					
					El primer secretario del Comite Central de la UJS, Ri Yong Chol, presento el informe de la ocasion y hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la historia de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun es la sagrada cronica en que el defendio firmemente, profundizo y desarrollo la idea y la linea de dar prioridad al fusil y a los asuntos militares, presentadas por el Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung.
					
					Ademas, constituye la trayectoria orgullosa de victorias y glorias en que el preparo invencibles fuerzas militares y logro el milagro y cambio seculares en la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyaqui y la construccion de una patria rica practicando la original politica de Songun.
					
					Se refirieron a que el Dirigente formo al ejercito popular como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu al dirigir la revolucion del Songun y mostro a todo el mundo la dignidad y la potencia de la Corea del Juche en la defensa del socialismo y la construccion de una gran potencia prospera al consolidar la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias.
					
					Todos los jovenes deben armarse firmemente con la idea de la revolucion del Songun del Dirigente y hacerse el peloton suicida, las bombas y las balas para defender a la Direccion de la Revolucion en lo politico e ideologico y a costa de la vida dando continuidad a la sagrada tradicion de defender al Lider a costa de la vida.
					
					 En el acto fue recitado el poema "!Viva la gran victoria del Songun!"

articles.title: ATCC revela objetivo de aumento de gastos militares en Japon
articles.content:
ATCC revela objetivo de aumento de gastos militares en Japon
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ATCC) -- En estos dias, se tornan cada vez mas abiertos en Japon los movimientos tendentes a aumentar los gastos para la defensa.
					El gobierno y el gobernante Partido Democratico Liberal de ese pais isleno anotaron ese proposito en la "orientacion principal" y el "proyecto final" que van a presentar cuando enmienden la "guia de planificacion de defensa" a finales del ano en curso.
					
					Estas pretensiones de Japon constituyen una muestra coherente de la ambicion militarista de exacerbar la situacion regional aumentando y modernizando mas sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					Anteriormente, este pais isleno vino incrementando sistematicamente los gastos militares bajo el rotulo de "defensa".
					
					Estos fondos sobrepasan ya 40 mil millones de US dolares en la composicion del presupuesto estatal y su mayoria se gasta para modernizar a las "fuerzas de autodefensa".
					
					Por otra parte, entran en la etapa crucial los quehaceres para construir grandes buques de guerra y aviones capaces de realizar vuelos a larga distancia, pertrecharse con armas nucleares y militarizar el cosmos.
					
					?Sera acaso esto para la "defensa del territorio nacional"?
					
					Japon busca el pretexto del aumento de gastos para la defensa en la incertidumbre de "seguridad regional".
					
					En este sentido, insiste en que la "situacion del Nordeste Asiatico no permite disminuir las fuerzas de defensa", "hay que poseer las fuerzas armadas capaces de hacer frente a la situacion del contorno", etc.
					
					Estas palabras no pasan de ser la sofisteria para justificar el aumento de esos gastos y las fuerzas armadas y enganar a la sociedad internacional.
					
					Tales movimientos de Japon partieron de su objetivo de tomar la absoluta superioridad militar en la region del Nordeste Asiatico y reagredir al continente.
					
					Hoy dia, la sociedad internacional esta muy preocupada de que el gobierno, el partido en el poder y el circulo militar de ese pais abogan al unisono por aumentar los gastos de defensa.
					
					Claro esta que el incremento de estos fondos causara en un futuro no lejano grandes flagelos en el Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.
